<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"EVM Service Request"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Handles EVM service requests. This endpoint processes API requests and forwards them to the appropriate endpoint in the Pocket Network.

**Server Usage & Authentication:**
- **Subdomain URLs** (`https://{serviceId}.rpc.grove.city`):
  - Service ID determined from subdomain, no `Target-Service-Id` header needed
  - **Requires** `Portal-Application-ID` header with your Grove Portal Application ID
  - **Optional** `Authorization` header with Grove API Key (if your portal app requires it)
- **Local PATH** (`http://localhost:3069`):
  - **Requires** `Target-Service-Id` header to specify the service
  - No authentication headers required


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Portal-Application-ID","in":"header","required":false,"description":"Grove Portal Application ID for authentication.\n\n**Required when using:**\n- `https://{serviceId}.rpc.grove.city` (production subdomain URLs)\n\n**Not required when using:**\n- `http://localhost:3069` (local PATH instance)\n\nGet yours at https://portal.grove.city/\n","schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"your-grove-portal-app-id"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":false,"description":"Grove API Key for authorization (optional).\n\n**When to use:**\n- Required if your Grove Portal application requires API key authorization\n- Not required for applications without API key restrictions\n- Only applicable when using production URLs (`https://{serviceId}.rpc.grove.city`)\n- Not used with local PATH instances (`http://localhost:3069`)\n\nGet yours at https://portal.grove.city/\n","schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"your-api-key"},{"name":"Target-Service-Id","in":"header","required":false,"description":"The service ID to route the request to (required for local PATH instance)\n\n**Required when using:**\n- `http://localhost:3069` (local PATH instance)\n\n**Not required when using:**\n- `https://{serviceId}.rpc.grove.city` (service-specific subdomain URLs)\n\nWhen using subdomain-based URLs, the service ID is automatically determined from the subdomain.\n","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
